patthana16.11:4.1: Abyākataṃ lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naabyākato nalokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.11:4.2: Abyākataṃ lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nakusalo nalokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.11:4.3: Abyākataṃ lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naakusalo nalokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.11:4.4: Abyākataṃ lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naakusalo nalokiyo ca naabyākato nalokiyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.11:4.5: Abyākataṃ lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nakusalo nalokiyo ca naakusalo nalokiyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.11:4.6: Hetuyā pañca … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana16.11:5.1: Kusalaṃ lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.11:5.2: Kusalaṃ lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.11:5.3: Kusalaṃ lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nalokuttaro ca naakusalo nalokuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.11:6.1: Abyākataṃ lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.11:6.2: Abyākataṃ lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.11:6.3: Abyākataṃ lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nalokuttaro ca naakusalo nalokuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.11:7.1: Hetuyā cha … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
